item1: Front-End Platforms. Cboe provides multiple trading solutions services including Cboe Silexx, LiveVol Pro, FT Options, Trade Alert. Services include FIX Order Routing, Trade Drop Copy Network, Consolidated Audit Trail (“CAT”) reporting, broker connectivity. provide data services market participants globally through number distribution channels including direct, via vendor partners Cboe Global Cloud, which global cloud data distribution service.

item2: Cash spot markets Total revenues less cost revenues Cash Spot Markets Cash spot markets revenues less cost revenues increased three months ended September 30, 2025 compared same period 2024 primarily due increases transaction clearing fees less liquidity payments routing clearing costs (“net transaction clearing fees”) Europe Asia Pacific Global FX segments. Net transaction clearing fees increased primarily due 26% increase Cboe European equities matched ADNV, 9% increase Global FX net capture, 20% increase Cboe Clear Europe net settlement volumes. Cash spot markets revenues less cost revenues increased nine months ended September 30, 2025 compared same period 2024 primarily due increases net transaction clearing fees Europe Asia Pacific Global FX segments. Net transaction clearing fees increased primarily due 36% increase Cboe European equities matched ADNV, 12% increase Global FX ADNV, 22% increase Cboe Clear Europe net settlement volumes, partially offset decrease net transaction clearing fees North American equities segment primarily due 40% decrease U.S.
